Package com.example.butter

package com.example.butter
  • Class
    Description
    CaptureAct
    This class allows us to customize the scanning functionality and add a back button to the scanner.
    ConfirmationDialog
    Dialog shows up everytime the user tries to delete something.
    ConfirmationDialog.ConfirmationDialogListener
    Defines Confirmation Dialog Listener Interface
    CreateEventFragment
    This class is for organizers to publish new events A simple activity called from EventsFragment when the '+' button is clicked.
    CreateProfileActivity
    A simple activity called from SplashActivity Creates a new user in the database, given that this user does not exist.
    CreateProfileActivity.OnFacilitiesLoadedCallback
    Callback interface used to callbacks after an asynchronous query on the database.
    DateFormatter
    Formats dates into a nicer format to be displayed in the app author: Nate Pane (natepane)
    EditEventActivity
    This activity is used to edit the details of an event Called from OrganizerOptions, which passes the eventID as an argument.
    EditProfileActivity
    A simple activity called from ProfileFragment To edit/update an existing user in the database Is called to from ProfileFragment when the user clicks the button to edit their profile.
    EditProfileActivity.OnFacilitiesLoadedCallback
     
    EntrantListsActivity
    This activity is used to display the users in any event's waitlist/draw list/registered list/cancelled list Only the organizer of the event can see this The organizer currently has the ability to move a single (random) user from the waitlist to the draw list Current outstanding issues: more functionality needs to be added for moving users between lists
    EntrantsArrayAdapter
    This is the array adapter for User objects This is used to display users in user lists Current outstanding issues: need to implement poster images
    Event
    This is the main model class for events Current outstanding issues: Currently have a getter for the String equivalent of non-string fields because I don't know how to pull non-string data from Firebase
    EventArrayAdapter
    This is an array adapter for Event objects This is used to display the events an organizer has published on the "Events" screen Current outstanding issues: need to implement poster images
    EventDB
    This class can be used to interact with the "event" collection of our Firebase database It implements methods to easily add, update and remove events in this collection
    EventDetailsActivity
    This activity shows the details of an event when it is clicked on from the "Events" screen It also includes buttons for more organizer options (e.g.
    EventDetailsActivity.OnDateValidationListener
     
    EventsFragment
    This is the main "Events" screen On this screen, all the events published by the logged in user will be displayed This fragment is called to from MainActivity as one of the options on the bottom bar.
    GeolocationDialog
    Dialog that informs the user the event requires geolocation and sets up a cancel and yes button that will determine whether user will join the waiting list or not in EventDetailsActivity.
    GeolocationDialog.GeolocationDialogListener
    Defines the GeolocationDialogListener Interface
    HomeAdapter
    This is the array adapter for lists on the HomeFragment screen.
    HomeAdapter.OnItemClickListener
     
    HomeAdapter.RegisteredViewHolder
     
    HomeAdminFragment
    This fragment is used to set up the home screen on the admins side.
    HomeEntrantFragment
    This fragment is used to set up the home screen on the entrants / entrants + organizers side.
    HomeFragment
    A simple Fragment subclass.
    ImageDB
    This class can be used to interact with the "image" collection in Firebase author: Nate Pane (natepane)
    ImagesArrayAdapter
    This is an array adapter for QR codes and Poster objects This is used to display the posters and QR objects in "Browse QR Codes" and "Browse Event Posters".
    MainActivity
    This activity is used to implement the navigation bar of the app with menu icons that will have constraints depending on a users privileges.
    MapDB
    This class can be used to interact with the "map" collection in Firebase author: Nate Pane (natepane)
    Notification
    This is the main model class for notifications
    NotificationArrayAdapter
    This is the array adapter for notifications on the NotificationsFragment screen.
    NotificationDB
    This class can be used to interact with the "notification" collection in Firebase author: Nate Pane (natepane)
    NotificationDialog
    This is the NotificationDialog used to prompt the user with a dialogue for their notification when sent.
    NotificationManagerHelper
    Used to manage notifications.
    NotificationsFragment
    A simple Fragment subclass.
    OrganizerOptions
    This is the dialog box for organizer options This dialog box has options such as edit event, see QR code, see users in the event's lists, etc.
    OrganizerShowCodeActivity
    This activity displays the QR code for this activity This QR code can be scanned by a user in order to join the waiting list for the event This activity also displays some event details as well
    ProfileFragment
    A simple Fragment subclass.
    QRCodeDB
    This class can be used to interact with the "QRCode" collection of our Firebase database It implements methods to easily add and remove QR codes in this collection
    RegisteredFragment
    Registered fragment to check if we are in the registered list.
    SplashActivity
    This is the first screen that will be shown on boot-up (as specified in AndroidManifest.xml) Uses SplashActivity to provide a splash screen on boot.
    User
    This is the main model class for users Current outstanding issues: Currently have a getter for the String equivalent of non-string fields because I don't know how to pull non-string data from Firebase
    UserArrayAdapter
    This is an array adapter for User objects This is used to display the users / or the users facilities in "Browse Profiles" and "Browse Facilities"
    UserDB
    This class can be used to interact with the "user" collection of our Firebase database It implements methods to easily add, update and remove users in this collection
    UserListDB
    This class can be used to interact with the "userList" collection of our Firebase database It implements methods to create user lists, add users to lists, remove users from lists and delete lists
    ViewMap
    This activity displays the Map using OpenStreetMap (OSM) The map shows the location where each entrant has scanned the QR code and entered the waiting list Generates markers for each entrant
    ViewPagerAdapter
    View Pager Adapter for viewing different lists Determines which list to return, by choosing between Registered list and Waiting list Communicates with RegisteredFragment and WaitingListFragment to get these lists.
    WaitingListFragment
    WaitingListFragment for viewing the waiting list Simply gets and returns the view Is called to from ViewPagerAdapter
